src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples module¶

Description:

This script is used to extract keywords from the medical transcription

src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples.calculate_optimal_candidate_nr(text: str) → int¶

Calculate the optimal number of candidates for each text to use for keyword extraction :param text: Text to extract keywords from :type text: str

Returns:

Optimal number of candidates to use for keyword extraction

Return type:

int

src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples.keyword_extraction(x: str, model, nr_candidates: int, top_n: int) → list[tuple]¶

This function extracts keywords from the input text. :param x: Input sentence. :type x: str :param model: Path to the model to use for keyword extraction :type model: str

Returns:

List of keywords.

Return type:

list[str]

src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples.keywords_from_MLM_model(df: DataFrame, model: str) → DataFrame¶

Extract keywords from the input text using the MLM model :param df: Dataframe with the medical transcription text to extract keywords from :type df: pd.DataFrame :param model: Path to the model to use for keyword extraction :type model: str

Returns:

Dataframe with the keywords and weights extracted from the input text

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples.keywords_from_TC_model(df: DataFrame, model: str) → DataFrame¶

Extract keywords from the input text using the TC model :param df: Dataframe with the medical transcription text to extract keywords from :type df: pd.DataFrame :param model: Path to the model to use for keyword extraction :type model: str

Returns:

Dataframe with the keywords and weights extracted from the input text

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples.main() → None¶

Main function to run the script

src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples.save_dataframe(df: DataFrame) → None¶

Save dataframe to csv file :param df: This is the final dataframe with the keywords and weights to save :type df: pd.DataFrame

src.nlp.keybert_mtsamples.small_column_df(df: DataFrame) → DataFrame¶

Make the transcription column smaller than 512 tokens :param df: Dataframe with the medical transcription text to extract keywords from :type df: pd.DataFrame

Returns:

Dataframe with the transcription column smaller than 512 tokens

Return type:

pd.DataFrame
